entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 7:12 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: ESE 56 km/h gust 67 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in the Natuashish area.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in the Natuashish area. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
